str2: That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To bring back word, report; I announce, declare. From ana and the base of aggelos; to announce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
